text: Tohru Mogami from Selete, Inc. in Tsukuba, Japan was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2012 for his work in surface-channel pMOSFET and nanoscale transistor technology. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Japanese engineers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Tohru Mogami
